DOC.brief_summary: The study objectives follow : 1 ) To examine acute vascular response continuous low- moderate-intensity exercise interval training ; 2 ) To examine influence age gender response .
DOC.detailed_description: The type , intensity duration exercise , fitness state , timing measurement report influence acute vascular response exercise . However , little know regard influence interval training , age gender response . The objective study : 1 ) examine acute vascular response continuous low- moderate-intensity exercise interval training ; 2 ) examine influence age gender response . Subjects perform follow 3 type treadmill exercise random order : 1 ) slow-pace walking ; 2 ) moderate-pace walking ; 3 ) interval training . Flow mediate dilation use high resolution ultrasonography arterial stiffness use applanation tonometry measure , immediately 1-hour acute bout exercise .
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 79 year age Women premenopausal postmenopausal ( either natural surgical ) define cessation menses least 2 year . Premenopausal woman eumenorrheic . Able give consent . History hepatic disease infection hepatitis B , C HIV History relevant ongoing recurrent illness Recent ( within 3 month ) recurrent hospitalization Current intake medication may affect study result Use tobacco product Premenopausal woman take oral contraceptive postmenopausal woman take hormone replacement therapy .
